arabic: اَللَّهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَى مُحَمَّدٍ وَ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ
اَللَّهُمَّ اجْعَلْ لِيْ فِيْهِ إِلَى مَرْضَاتِكَ دَلِيْلًا
وَلَا تَجْعَلْ لِلشَّيْطَانِ فِيْهِ عَلَيَّ سَبِيلًا
translation: In the Name of Allāh, the All-beneficent, the All-merciful.
O' Allāh send Your blessings on Muhammad and the family of Muhammad.
O Allah; on this day, (please] make for me a course that takes me to Your pleasure;
And do not make for Satan a course to me;
And make Paradise my home and dwelling;
O He Who settles the needs of the beseechers.
transliteration: allāhumma ṣalli `alā muḥammadin wa āli muḥammad
allāhummaj`al lī fīhi ilā mar-ḍātika dalīlā
